participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and adventurous, loves skateboarding and hanging out with friends.
participant_1.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. i'm a skateboarder. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: curious and a bit rebellious, she often feels overwhelmed by school but loves to ride the bus because it gives her time to think.
participant_2.background: i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i'm 13 years old. i hate math class.
